MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the  LL65 and LL71 postcode areas of Tyn Lon, Llandrygan and Carmel. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  7:47PM. Our engineers have arrived on site and confirmed the power cut has been caused by a fault on the electrical cable network. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 10:00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:55PM on 23rd April 2021.
